content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *a gorgeous belt is crocheted in one strand of lumina and 2 strands of seduce the colorway possibilities are endless berroco com * skill level easy materials 1 hank berroco lumina 25 grs #1620 gold coast 1 hank each berroco seduce 40 grs #4437 gris-bleu and #4436 rye crochet hook size 6 00 mm j one 2 diameter flat plastic ring tapestry needle gauge 12 single_crochet s = 4 6 row = 2 in single_crochet with all 3 yarns held decrease belt is worked from the long edge pattern 1-row repeat
